alert.note: Alert for Lee; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:23PM CDT until March 26 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LEE AND SOUTHEASTERN TALLAPOOSA COUNTIES... At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Notasulga, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southern Lake Martin, Roxana, Reeltown and Yates Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
